channel.title: Elasticsearch on vesey.tech
channel.description: Recent content in Elasticsearch on vesey.tech

item.title: versefind
item.description:
Ever remember a snatch of lyrics from a song you know you have saved in your Spotify library?

Ever search for that brief phrase in Google but find only unrelated tracks?

That can be enough to drive a person crazy. I wrote a tool that lets you search through your library to find these earworms.

https://versefind.vesey.tech

[source]
